content:
Worksheet 5: Time-Blocking Table

Instructions:

* Fill in the table below with your own time-blocking schedule.
* Allocate specific times for each task and include breaks as needed.

| Time | Monday | Tuesday | Wednesday | Thursday | Friday | Saturday | Sunday |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 6:00 am - 7:00 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 7:00 am - 8:00 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 8:00 am - 9:00 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 9:00 am - 10:00 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 10:00 am - 10:15 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 10:15 am - 11:00 am |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 11:00 am - 12:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 12:00 pm - 1:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 2:00 pm - 2:15 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 2:15 pm - 3:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 3:00 pm - 4:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 4:00 pm - 5:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 5:00 pm - 6:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |

Customize the table above to fit your own unique situation and responsibilities. Allocate specific times for each task and include breaks as needed. Use the example provided in the book as a guide and be sure to include all important tasks and activities, including work, homeschooling, personal activities, and leisure time. By following a time-blocking schedule, you can stay focused and motivated, knowing that you're making progress towards your goals. Use this table as a tool to keep yourself accountable and on track towards a more productive and balanced life.
